comments:
I fixed a bug in Platform Text which results in an NPE in TextConsoleViewer.handleDispose() (see below for the stack trace).

The reason for this is that the TextConsoleViewer first calls super.handleDispose and then afterwards tries to access disposed information. Instead it should first dispose its own stuff and then call super.handleDispose.

Test Case:
1. load org.eclipse.jface.text from HEAD
2. replace TextViewer.java with rev. 1.162 (the code in HEAD contains a work
   around for this NPE)
3. start target
4. open Console
5. select Java Stack Trace console
6. exit
==> NPE
